description: Demonstrates using the ui_hint parameter to explicitly specify UI type, bypassing the LLM classifier. This saves the classification LLM call when the agent knows what UI type it needs.

cells.name: explicit_confirmation
cells.instructions: Ask for approval using ask_human with an explicit ui_hint. Use ask_human with parameters: question='Approve this action?', ui_hint='confirmation'. This should skip LLM classification and directly create a confirmation UI.

cells.name: explicit_rating
cells.instructions:
User response: {{ state.explicit_confirmation }}

Now ask for a rating with explicit ui_hint. Use ask_human with parameters: question='Score this interaction', ui_hint='rating'. This should create a rating UI without calling the classifier.

cells.name: result
